settings.editor:
What to Expect in Jet Ski Ride in Dubai

Furthermore, our excellent jet skis are sure to provide an amazing experience, whether you're a thrill-seeker searching for an exhilarating adventure or just want to see the gorgeous coastline from a different angle. Also, all of our customers can expect a smooth and exciting voyage thanks to desertdaytravels Tourism's dedication to safety and customer satisfaction. Jet ski rental Dubai Marina is available for 30, 60, or 120 minutes depending on the package you choose. Moreover, we suggest the 60-minute ride, just perfect for both professionals and beginners. Also, the 120-minute ride is meant for those who really seek to immerse themselves in the exhilaration of jetting through the waters. So, the 30-minute ride is ideal for those looking just to get a feel of the experience.

Jet ski Ride Dubai  is available for you to explore the various attractions in Dubai that have on offer including the Sheikh Island and the Dubai Royal Family Beachfront Palaces. Furthermore, take in breathtaking views of the Jumeirah Beach Residence and the world's best hospitality destination, the Burj Al Arab as you go skimming through the crystal clear waters of the sea. Also, there are different packages available for you to choose from so you can pick one that fits into your budget and go on a super thrilling adventure sport.

Highlights

The splash of the lovely warm waters of the Arabian Gulf is surely refreshing as you go tearing through it on one of our jet skis, which are easy to handle. So, no matter whether you are an experienced customer or a beginner, the luxury Jet Ski Rental Dubai adventure is an experience you won’t ever forget. Its thrill is undoubtedly amazing as you twist and turn through the waters on one of our power-packed jet skis. Worry not about our safety as it’s duly taken care of as per the guidelines mentioned by the authorities. Thus, it’s time to brace yourself and prepare for an unforgettable water sports in Dubai that makes your trip to Dubai truly unforgettable.

Why You Should Opt for It

  • It’s a safe, yet thrilling ride through the crystal clear sea waters of the Arabian Gulf, a truly unforgettable experience
  • It’s an adventure sport that thrills all those you bring along
  • For constant help all through the adventure, you’ll be given professional support
  • While you may zip through the water on your own, you may take along a friend for a company or a trainer
  • You need not be a professional for this sport. The jet skis are easy to handle

Some Important Information

  • You must sign a waiver form for Jet Ski Rental Dubai
  • You must carry your passport or the Emirate ID for this activity
  • You must be 10 years or older for this activity
  • Please bring your own costumes and towels
  • You need no previous experience
  • Participants need to know how to swim
  • The pick-ups are only from your Dubai hotel or residence and not the airport. So you can take desertdaytravels's transportation services accordingly.
  • We shall allot you a date and time depending on the availability of slots

FAQs

Q. What kind of clothing should one be in?

Swim trunks and bathing suits are ideal clothes for this activity as you can stretch your limbs and be comfortable. As for footwear, you should go for aqua socks or water shoes. Additionally, you shall be provided life vests, goggles, and gloves for complete safety.

Q. Where can I get a Jet ski for rent in Dubai?

You can contact desertdaytravels Tourism to get a jet ski for rent in Dubai. We will provide you with all the necessary instructions before participating in this activity. Additionally, you can also rent a car from us to reach the location on time.

Q. Is a licence mandatory for jet skiing in Dubai?

No. Since the jet ski ride is a recreational sport, you don't need a licence to ride it. It’s meant solely for the entertainment of tourists. The guides we provide have all the necessary licences and permits that are legally mandated to possess. Thus, all you need to bring along is proof of identity that shall be valid in the UAE to rent a Jet Ski.

Q. What is the minimum age to rent a Jet Ski in Dubai?

You should be a minimum of 10 years old to be able to participate in this activity. Moreover, this is mandatory even if you choose to take a backseat during the ride. As the riding speed is high, there’s a chance of the person taking the back seat falling off often. Hence, the person needs to have a certain level of physical strength which makes the age limit necessary.

Q. Is this activity safe?

Yes indeed, there is nothing to worry about. Professionals will give you instructions. However, you must know how to swim. Also, participants should not consume alcohol or heavy meals before the activity. Any participant who has undergone surgery recently should not take part in this activity.

Q. What is the duration of the Jet Ski Ride?

The duration of the activity depends on the package selected by you so you need to look at the details before you book your package. A normal package will give you 30 minutes to enjoy the activity.

Q. What items should I carry for the activity?

You should wear appropriate swimwear for the activity. Participants should also bring an extra change of clothes, a towel, and sunscreen. Also, if you wish to capture footage or pictures of this amazing activity then do bring a waterproof camera to capture memories.

Q. Can I bring my friend along for a jet ski rental in Dubai?

Yes, you can bring friends as there are many packages for duo rides too.

Q. When is the ideal time to go for a Jet Ski rental in Dubai?

The truth is you can indulge in this activity any time of the year, but if you want to avoid the scorching sun during the summer then you should stick to the winter months to enjoy it to the fullest. Also, don't forget to try Scuba Diving in Dubai for an underwater experience.

Q. Do the participants get any guidance from the trainers?

Yes, you will, the trainers are present at the spot to supervise your activity and they will also brief you on the various safety measures before the ride commences. They make sure that you are aware everything about jet ski ride in Dubai
